item.title: Choosing the Right Backpack
item.description: The most crucial part of travelling is having the right equipment – but most importantly a decent backpack. We initially checked a few backpacks online but realised that there’s no way of finding out if these backpacks are suitable for our frames – I’m only 5’3 whereas Kyle is 6’1. Plus, we didn’t want the hassle of ordering a backpack, waiting for delivery then finding out it wasn’t the right fit and then having the faff of sending it back!
